results.title: Studio Ghibli Ponyo Sleeping Ponyo in Bubble Mini Backpack ...
results.htmlTitle: Studio Ghibli Ponyo Sleeping Ponyo in Bubble Mini Backpack ...
results.snippet: The lovable goldfish princess is ready to embark on your next adventure with you as this adorable Studio Ghibli mini backpack and crossbody bag set!
results.htmlSnippet: The lovable goldfish princess is ready to embark on your next adventure with you as this adorable Studio Ghibli mini backpack and crossbody bag set!

metatags.twitter:title: Studio Ghibli Ponyo Sleeping Ponyo in Bubble Mini Backpack & Crossbody Bag Set - BoxLunch Exclusive | BoxLunch
metatags.twitter:description: The lovable goldfish princess is ready to embark on your next adventure with you as this adorable Studio Ghibli mini backpack and crossbody bag set! Seen swimming amongst bubbles as the allover print of this mini backpack, Ponyo also appears as a super cute sleepy graphic on the removable front pocket. With gold-toned hardware, top handle, included crossbody strap (to attach to the front pocket for a new style!), brand badge, adjustable shoulder straps, and an interior floral lining, this set is all you need to bring the charming world of Ponyo to your next outing. Rock the look as one or split it into two, the choice is yours when you add this set to your accessory collection. A BoxLunch Exclusive!

    Product ID: 17668446

    Studio Ghibli Ponyo Sleeping Ponyo in Bubble Mini Backpack & Crossbody Bag Set - BoxLunch Exclusive
    The lovable goldfish princess is ready to embark on your next adventure with you as this adorable Studio Ghibli mini backpack and crossbody bag set! Seen swimming amongst bubbles as the allover print of this mini backpack, Ponyo also appears as a super cute sleepy graphic on the removable front pocket. With gold-toned hardware, top handle, included crossbody strap (to attach to the front pocket for a new style!), brand badge, adjustable shoulder straps, and an interior floral lining, this set is all you need to bring the charming world of Ponyo to your next outing. Rock the look as one or split it into two, the choice is yours when you add this set to your accessory collection. 

    A BoxLunch Exclusive! 
    • Polyurethane; polyester lining 
    • Backpack approx. 9" W x 11" H x 4 1/2” D 
    • Crossbody approx. 5” H x 6 1/2” H x 1 1/2” D 
    • Imported
